Items.Name: Cully Automation Ltd
Items.Description:
Cully Automation offers a full spectrum of services from Instrumentation & Analytical devices to large-scale, integrated control systems, from project specification, Project Design to project management, and from meter installations to commissioning and maintenance. 

Cully Automation supplies the highest quality Instrumentation, & measurement and control equipment available.

As an ABB Value Provider, we are the sole Partner for supplying ABB’s vast range of Instrumentation, Continuous Water Analysers, and Control & Automation Products to the Irish & Northern Ireland Water Utility Markets

Address.StreetAddress: P 8A, CIT Road, Scheme-6M, Phool Bagan

Items.Name: Current Engineering Solutions Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
Current Engineering Solutions Pty Ltd are a small West Australian Electrical 
Engineering company specialising in variable speed drives, engineering, process 
optimisation and upgrades, automation and control.

Now stocking the following in Perth:
•	VVVF Drives: From 1.5kW to 45kW 
•	Soft Starters: From 7.5kW to 18.5kW

Items.Name: Custech Machinery Sdn Bhd
Items.Description:
Custech Machinary Sdn Bhd specializes in custom machinery primarily for te 
small & medium industries. We are an one stop service oriented center that does 
in-house designing, fabrication and also provide technical support & complete 
solutions for your production needs.

Our expertise & experiences in custom design machinery & system become 
benchmark for our project team to provide simple yet efficient system at 
affordable price.

Custech Machiery Sdn Bhd was formally known as Emech Intergrated Technology , 
was founded back in 1999 and was incorporated on october 2002.

Items.Name: Cyan Tec Systems Ltd
Items.Description:
Cyan Tec provides complex, precision automation and robotic solutions to a wide range of advanced manufacturing industries including aerospace, nuclear, automotive, electronics, plastics and pharmaceutical. 
From standalone machines to full turnkey cells, Cyan Tec takes pride in the diversity and technical complexity of projects delivered. 
In addition to advanced automation, Cyan Tec specialises in high-end, precision technologies including industrial laser and inkjet integration.
Cyan Tec are leaders in advanced laser integration, with a proven track record in providing high-tech solutions for variety of applications including laser cutting, welding, cladding, and ablation/cleaning. Cyan Tec laser specialists guide customers to identify the optimal solution for their application.
Cyan Tec have the industrial inkjet expertise to enable customers to successfully integrate digital printing solutions into their production line. Cyan Tec’s inkjet knowledge and capability enables OEMs to incorporate digital printing technology into their equipment.
Cyan Tec’s strength is based on the dedication and professionalism of its highly skilled, multi-disciplinary engineers, who are focused on providing cost effective, quality solutions to meet customer expectations in demanding production environments.

Address.StreetAddress: 25/6, Bosepara Road, Ps.: Thakurpukur, Po.: Purba Barisha

Items.Name: Cyrus Infra-Tech Private Ltd
Items.Description:
We, Cyrus Infra-Tech Private Limited, established in 2010 by few enthusiastic professionals who have spent more than two decades in the field of Instrumentation & Automation and well known by their names in the same fields, especially in Power, Metals, Sugar and Steel Sectors to whom you can rely upon.
Our aim in this company is to provide single point solution to our customer for their Plant Optimization and Implementation needs in the field of Instrumentation & Automation.
It may be a Turnkey Project, AMC, Technical Survey and many more related to the field of Design, Engineering & Projects.
Our field of specialization is Turnkey solutions in the field of Instrumentation & Automation. We do not mean Turnkey as a package; it means “You have to turn the key to run your plant, after we hand over it to you”.

Capable of offering turnkey packages which includes Design, Engineering, Supply, Erection and commissioning of Instrumentation systems with or without Control Systems.
Process knowledge of steel, power, sugar & paper industries helps in consolidating technically competent and clear offers.
Own expertise in supervising site activities helps in completing packages as per project schedule.

Items.Name: Da Shiang Automation Industrial Co
Items.Description:
Established in 2013, Da Shiang Automation (DSA) is located in Guishan industrial park, Taoyuan Taiwan. With the Business philosophy of Innovation, Technical, Scientific Spirit to service customer, DSA has been growing continuously.

As a highly skilled system integrator in automation with software and hardware technical skills, DSA has more than 10 years experiences in Investment Casting, Sand Casting, Die Casting and Machine Tending…etc.

In order to provide advanced smart automation solution, DSA further integrated industry 4.0 concept to casting and machine tending operation to fulfill customer expectation.

達詳自動化股份有限公司 ( Da shiang Automation, DSA)，成立於2013年，位於台灣桃園龜山工業區。DSA秉持著創新、技術、科學等經營理念與服務精神，創立至今一直持續穩定成長。

在自動化整合技術上，具備專業軟、硬體等，全方位的技術整合能力，更在精密鑄造、砂模鑄造、壓力鑄造、鑄造後處理、機械加工等製程設計上有長達10年以上的技術及製程相關經驗。

DSA更進而將工業4.0智慧製造系統，整合至鑄造及加工製程中，期望能提供客戶無論在製程改善，自動化、智慧化更完整的諮詢及服務。

Items.Name: Delta Control Gesellschaft fur Automation mbH
Items.Description: Engineering Capabilities for Melody available, also for Procontrol P14

Items.Name: Dem Automation & Workholding Ltd
Items.Description: DEM is an automation systems integrator and work holding solutions company, working to each individual requirement, however particular. From evaluation through to design, our team of highly-experienced professionals work together to create exactly what your manufacturing company needs to get the job done.

Items.Name: DESMA Schuhmaschinen GmbH
Items.Description:
DESMA supplies efficient and economical production systems of highest quality, 
reliably and fast, to footwear manufacturers worldwide.
DESMA stands for more than 60 years of solid craftsmanship combined with 
openness, innovation and the desire for change.

KLÖCKNER DESMA Shoe Machinery
... this is state–of–the–art technology combined with tried and trusted quality 
awareness.
... always focussed on our aim: the production of shoe machines which leave no 
wish unfulfilled.

We are committed to: deserving the customer's trust.

Items.Name: Dietz Automation & Umwelttechnik GmbH
Items.Description:
Seit 1997 beschäftigen wir uns mit Aufgabenstellungen im Bereich der Automatisierungstechnik. Als kleiner aber feiner und spezialisierter Dienstleister bieten wir unseren Kunden Unterstützung bei der täglichen Routine ebenso wie bei der Einführung von Innovationen an. 

Mit unseren Tools und Dienstleistungen nehmen wir Ihnen die Tätigkeiten ab, die Ihnen Zeit und Ressourcen für Ihr Kerngeschäft rauben. Wir planen Feldbusanlagen, führen Messungen und Tests durch und erledigen Routinetätigkeiten, Mengenbearbeitungen und Dokumentationen.

Wenn Sie keine Zeit für die Einführung neuer Technologien haben, prüfen wir für Sie, was sinnvoll ist, führen Tests durch und schulen Ihre Mitarbeiter in innovativen Techniken.

Leistungen:

- Industrielle Automation	
    - Engineering
    - Inbetriebnahme	
    - Planung
    - Messtechnik	
    - Bussysteme /Technologien	
    - Migration

- Umwelttechnik
    - Klärschlammtrocknung	
    - Wasser- und Abwasser	
    - Bioenergie	
    - Migration	
    - Planung

- IT-Service
    - Netzwerkadministration	
    - Telekommunikation

-  Trainings / Workshops

Address.StreetAddress: Unit 68, Gate 1 lvy Park, Pinetown, 35, Ceramic Curve Alton

Items.Name: Diversified Power And System Integration Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
Diversified Power & System Integration (DPSI) (PTY) LTD was formed by the 
merger of two companies, namely EEA Engineering cc (Electrical Engineering & 
Automation) and Diversified Power Systems cc (DPS). With this merger there is a 
51% BEE ownership of the new company.  Both companies provided a specialised 
service in the electrical, electronic and power protection sectors, where 
exceptional standards are required and maintained.  Since its inception DPSI 
has become one of the leading suppliers to a number of major corporations, 
large industries, small businesses and individual users in the highly 
specialized field. DPSI offers its clients with skilled electrical & power 
electronic services that entails:  
• Design and fabrication of LV distribution panels
• Electrical COC
• Supply, installation and commissioning of distribution panels
• Supply and installation of LV transformers
• Electrical construction work
• Faultfinding on electrical circuits
• Refurbishment of electrical panels
• Supply and installation of induction motors
• Lighting and illumination testing
• MCC maintenance
DPSI offers project management services in a broader scope of project 
management thorough the project life cycle.

Address.StreetAddress: Unit 45, HGI Bridgeway Business par 496 Pinnacle road, Tunney

Items.Name: D-Tec S.r.l.
Items.Description:
D-Tec è un distributore specializzato nell'automazione industriale. I prodotti 
principalmente gestiti sono: HMI, PLC, Inverter e Motori elettettrici. Il 
servizio offerto al cliente si basa su un elevata competenza tecnica in fase 
pre e post vendita

Items.Name: DUO Robotics
Items.Description:
We provide the Automotive, Aerospace and Composite industries with cost effective turnkey robotic solutions. We have standard systems that can be equipped with up to (4) 6 axis ABB robots specializing in material removal applications such as:

- Waterjet Cutting (water only and abrasive added)
- Waterjet Surface Preparation & Cleaning
- Routing
- Knife and Ultrasonic Cutting
- Laser Cutting

Items.Name: Duvivier - Dexis
Items.Description:
Duvivier-Motronic is een familiebedrijf, die reeds 90 jaar gespecialiseerd is in aandrijftechniek. Het herstellen en verdelen van een breed gamma aan elektromotoren, motorreductoren, pompen, frequentiesturingen en de bijbehorende toepassingen, vormt de corebusiness van het bedrijf.

In Duvivier-Motronic staat de klant centraal. Om u deze klantenservice te verschaffen, wordt u ondersteund door een volledig uitgerust Service Center. Met ons team, bestaande uit 20 experten, bedienen wij meer dan 2000 klanten.

Bij ons gaat klantgerichtheid gepaard met kwaliteit. De producten die wij aanbieden worden gekenmerkt door een hoog kwaliteitslabel. Zozijn wij officieel dealer van ABB-motoren.

Items.Name: Dynamic Service Co Ltd
Items.Description: 動能服務於2016五月創立,身為ABB正式經銷商,從一開始專注於保護電驛銷售及專案服務,到現今全面在高中低壓電力設備佈局推廣,深根台灣輸配電業界,努力朝向服務客戶及用電安全前進.Dynamic Service Co., Ltd. has founded since May 2016 as authorized distributor of ABB Taiwan. Focusing on protective relays promoting and servicing at beginning, Now, Dynamic has been expertizing on all ABB’s High/Medium/low voltage related area. Furthermore, in order to provide quality service in power T&D of Taiwan, Dynamic tends to serve all customer as much as we can with safety first concern.

Items.Name: Dynatec AB
Items.Description: Dynatec AB is a Norwegian owned company working with complete packaging and automation lines for the Scandinavian Food & Beverage Industry. Dynatec´s vision is to always be ahead of the demand from the market and constantly develop smart solutions that contribute to increased efficiency and a decreased load on workers.

Items.Name: E.I.L. S.r.l.
Items.Description: EIL S.r.l.

Items.Name: EAS GmbH Elektrische Antriebs- und Systemtechnik
East Engineering And Services Technology
Items.Description:
ETG is a group of medium sized companies focused on the engineering services 
for several industries and infrastructure activities.

The history of this Family owned business is back to the fifties of the last 
century when the founder Eng. Ragai Abdel Malek starts his business in the 
field of Roads building, bridges and building construction..

During the Seventies there was a new step to jump into the roads machinery 
supplies into the Egyptian market by a long lasting partnership with the AMMANN 
group of Switzerland.

End of the Nineties the second Generation took over and start a new activity 
diversification based on the solid and reputable reputation gained over the 
last fifty years

Today the Group includes 

EAST: Engineering and Services Technology S.A.E 

The heart of the group activities with Four Business units 

A)     Plant and Machines : Acting in the field of supplying of plants and 
machines used for the roads and building construction industries 

B)       Electro-automation : Acting in the field of motor, drives, 
instrumentation used for all kind of industries

C)      Development Services : Acting in the field of developing, designing, 
production of industrial solutions and services 

D)    Projects : Acting as a professional contractor with a great power and 
resources to accomplish any electromechanical contracting project according to 
the international standards and following all health and safety rules and 
standards.

PST:    Petroleum Services Technology Ltd.

This is the Group Arm acting in the oil and Gas sector with a wide range of 
services covering the onshore and offshore industry requests.

Address.StreetAddress: Unit 1 Eastern Avenue Trading Park, Eastern Avenue

Items.Name: EDC (NE) Ltd
Items.Description:
EDC (NE) Ltd. is a North of England based company specialising in the application, 
installation, commissioning and distribution of Variable Speed Drives and 
Motors. 
Our product portfolio features drives and controls from some of the worlds 
leading manufacturers.

Items.Name: EDC (Scotland) Ltd
Items.Description:
EDC Ltd. is a Scottish based company specialising in the application, 
installation, commissioning and distribution of Variable Speed Drives and 
Motors.
Our product portfolio features drives and controls from some of the worlds 
leading manufacturers.

Items.Name: Effetre Fenice Energia S.r.l.
Items.Description:
Fenice Energia nasce dal desiderio di un team di professionisti, con conclamata 
esperienza nel campo della cogenerazione, di dare continuità e sviluppo a un 
importante progetto aziendale.

I soci fondatori e tutti i dipendenti di FENICE ENERGIA, formano un team 
consolidato e molto affiatato, con esperienza e conoscenza maturata a tutti 
livelli aziendali.

L’azienda e tutti i dipendenti condividono l'obiettivo di progettare, produrre 
e assistere centrali per la produzione efficiente dell’energia, basato sulla  
tecnologia dei motori endotermici, nel campo della generazione, cogenerazione, 
ponendo particolare attenzione all’affidabilità e al contenuto tecnologico 
delle proprie realizzazioni.

Da 25 anni sviluppiamo il nostro lavoro e la nostra conoscenza tecnica. Sin 
dall’inizio le stesse figure chiave per la progettazione e Service, sin 
dall’inizio la stessa filosofia, sin dall’inizio la costante ricerca per i 
miglioramento delle macchine, per raggiungere il completo controllo della 
Macchina

Items.Name: Ekatech Automation AB
Items.Description:
Ekatech is a company with long experience within automation. From the beginning, Ekatech was purely an engineering and consult company with primary focuses on electrical and control engineering as a main occupation.

Today we span the entire area within industrial automation, where we project and deliver solutions to a wide scope of industries. We can also help your company on consultation basis, with solutions in machine safety, electricity, man-to-machine communications, control-based technology, and more.

Items.Name: El & Driftteknik i Strangnas AB
Items.Description:
EL & DRIFTTEKNIK i Strängnäs AB startade 1993 som en elektromekanisk verkstad, 
idag är vi ett serviceföretag som underhåller och reparerar elmotorer och 
elutrustningar både i den egna verkstaden och ute på industrigolvet.
Vi har bred teknisk kompetens och lång erfarenhet av att lösa problemen som 
uppstår på industrigolvet.
Med ett brett sortiment av elmotorer, drivsystem och industriförnödenheter kan 
vi erbjuda en snabb lösning vid ett haveri.
Installationer, industriservice och förebryggande underhåll.

Items.Name: Electro Dinamic Jo-An, S.L.
Items.Description: AVP service, LV motors and Atex workshop.

Items.Name: Electronica De Potencia Y Semiconductores Y Compania Sociedad En Comandita Por Acciones
Items.Description:
En EPYS ofrecemos soluciones integrales de proyectos en media y baja tensión. Nos caracterizamos por la calidad de nuestro servicio, asesoría, soporte, stock permanente en todas nuestras referencias de producto y entrega oportuna.

Además de suministrar todo lo que un proyecto necesita, contamos con una vasta experiencia y personal calificado para diseñar y proponer soluciones a la medida de sus necesidades.

Items.Name: Elektro Kreutzpointner GmbH
Items.Description:
Die Kreutzpointner Unternehmensgruppe besteht aus sieben rechtlich eigenständigen Firmen und zählt zu den großen mittelständischen Fachbetrieben in Deutschland für Elektrotechnik, Schaltanlagenbau, Engineering, IT und Neue Energien und wird seit der Gründung im Jahr 1923 als Familienunternehmen geführt. 
Mit ca. 1.200 Kreutzpointner-Mitarbeiter, davon rund 100 Auszubildende sowie rund 300 Beschäftigte von Arbeitnehmerüberlassungsfirmen und Nachunternehmern, erzielte die Unternehmensgruppe 2019 einen Umsatz von rund 110 Millionen Euro.
Kreutzpointner vereint eine Vielzahl von Spezialisten unter einem Dach und bietet so die besten Voraussetzungen um Projekte erfolgreich zu realisieren.

Items.Name: Elektroautomatik i Sverige AB
Items.Description:
With broad experience, sound traditions and deeply rooted in Swedish industry 
is a focus on the future.

EA was founded in Skövde 1965, a time when rapid industrialization took place 
in the region. Then, a small company focused on consulting in electrical and 
control engineering. Today, a larger, stronger company with broad expertise 
whose focus is to deliver complete solutions in industrial automation.

Items.Name: Elektrolindningar T Holm AB
Items.Description:
På Elektrolindningar T Holm AB har vi varit verksamma sedan 1953. Vi är idag 7 
anställda med huvudinriktning på försäljning och service av frekvensomriktare, 
elmotorer, pumpar, transmissioner och rullningslager, Vår främsta kundkrets är 
svensk basindustri. Men vi arbetar med alla, från privatpersoner till 
multinationella koncerner. 
Vi har en omfattande lagerhållning av produkter, med elmotorer i 500V utförande 
som specialitet. 

Vi jobbar med välkända leverantörer som vi är auktoriserad återförsäljare för:
ABB                 –elmotorer, frekvensomriktare 
Grundfos, Wilo             –pumpar     
Gates, KTR –transmissioner 
FAG, SKF  -rullningslager

Med vårt långvariga och breda bransch- och produktkunnande får du som kund 
kvalificerade och bra lösningar på de driftproblem du kan komma att ställas 
inför.
I vår egen verkstad servar vi motorer, pumpar, fläktar m.m. Vår 
balanseringsmaskin klarar objekt upp till 2 ton.
På plats hos er utför vi montage, byte av frekvensomriktare och elmotorer, 
lagerbyten, pumprenoveringar, laseruppriktning, påplatsbalansering, och 
konditionsmätning.
Vi kan även hjälpa er med backup på era frekvensomriktarparametrar.

Items.Name: Elektroservice Stig Eskilson AB
Items.Description:
Elektroservice Stig Eskilson AB är en elektromekanisk verkstad som grundades 
1969.
Idag är vi 14 anställda i företaget och jobbar med försäljning av kompletta 
drivsystem 
eller de komponenter som ingår. 
Vi arbetar med kvalitetsprodukter från marknadsledande leverantörer inom
följande produktområden.

• Elmotorer 
• Frekvensomriktare
• Servo/Linjärdrifter
• Mjukstartare
• Pumpar 
• Kuggväxelmotorer
• Transmissioner 
• Svetsar 
• Elverk 

Förebyggande underhåll på plats hos våra industrikunder är en viktig del i vår 
verksamhet. 
Med kompetent personal och många års erfarenhet på vår verkstad kan vi erbjuda 
kunden följande tjänster.  

• Omlindning och renovering av elmotorer 
• Service och renovering av pumpar och fläktar 
• Service av svetsar 
• Mekanisk bearbetning 
• SPM-mätning (kontroll av lager och vibrationer) 
• Balansering och laseruppriktning.
• Renovering av kuggväxlar


Vår målsättning är att med hjälp av ett brett lager på industrikomponenter 
och kompetent service snabbt ska kunna hjälpa kunden att lösa sina problem.
För att få så hög servicegrad som möjligt erbjuder vi även jourverksamhet.
www.elektro-service.se

Items.Name: Elektroverkstaden Kent Andersson AB
Items.Description:
Elektroverkstaden Kent Andersson AB är en elektromekanisk verkstad med mycket 
kunskap och lång erfarenhet inom branschen. Att företaget är ungt innebär inte 
att vi är nya i branschen. Vi har totalt över 50 års erfarenhet samlade under 
vårt tak.
 
Vi hjälper våra kunder med lösningar på problem när det gäller; Elmotorer, 
Frekvensstyrningar, Fläktar och Pumpar av alla de slag. 
Förebyggande service och dokumentation är ledord inom företaget. 

Elektroverkstaden är: Summan av kunskap, kompetens och service.  
• Vi installerar och driftsätter nya maskiner och pumpanläggningar. Vi utför 
service på motorer, pumpar och övrig anläggning på plats hos er.  
• Omlindning och reparation av elmotorer. Reparation av pumpar, transmissioner 
och övriga elektromekaniska applikationer. 
• Vi hjälper er med beräkningar, dimensionering och programmering.

Items.Name: Elimko Elektronik Imalat Ve Kontrol Ltd. Sti.
Items.Description:
Elimko Co. Ltd. is a LEADER establishment that operates in Automatic Control Systems and Facility Solutions.

With a total of 11,000 m2 closed area; 1,500 m2 headquarters and 9,500 m2 factory space our company continues its operations since 1976 by producing electronic measurement, control, recorder devices, thermocouples, resistance thermometers, various sensors, belt weighers, dosing belts, and other weighing equipments. With its engineering background, it brings complete turn-key Automatic Control Systems to a wide range of organizations.

Manufaturing at a factory with a wide range of facilities located within 60 acres, our company has been "RELIABLE NAME IN AUTOMATIC CONTROL SYSTEMS AND TURN-KEY CONTRACTS" in our country and abroad with serious-rigorous and coherent studies.

Items.Name: Elin SAS Di Pasotti Diego Impianti Elettrici Civili E Industriali
